entry.title: Message Signing based authentication
entry.summary: The context is a PGP signed message with a discussion between two individuals, Johnathan Corgan and bitcoingrant@gmx.com. The discussion revolves around the concern of signing an arbitrary string by the client when the server provides a token. Johnathan expresses his concern about the possibility of signing an evil document hash instead of the intended string. He suggests XORing the string with a randomly generated nonce before signing it to ensure security. The conversation ends with a PGP signature from Johnathan.
